trans-unit.source: Abstract class used internally by the WPF XAML compiler to support the use of internal types.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.

trans-unit.source: When compiling a XAML file, you can use public types, but you can also use internal types subject to the same limitations that exist on code access to internal types.
trans-unit.target: Ao compilar um arquivo XAML, você pode usar os tipos públicos, mas você também pode usar os tipos internos sujeita às mesmas limitações que existem no acesso de código para tipos internos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> enables support of internal access level types for markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> Habilita o suporte de tipos de nível de acesso interno para marcação.

trans-unit.source: This involves the compiler creating a generated class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> and implements its members.
trans-unit.target: Isso envolve o compilador a criar uma classe gerada que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> e implementa seus membros.

trans-unit.source: The generated class exists in a security and access context such that only the same assembly or other assemblies specifically attributed for shared internal access can reference the generated class and thus the internal types.
trans-unit.target: A classe gerada existe em um contexto de segurança e acesso, de modo que apenas o mesmo assembly ou outros assemblies especificamente atribuídos para acesso interno compartilhado podem fazer referência a classe gerada e, portanto, os tipos internos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper" /> class.
The event information for the event (CLR reflection information).
The target where the handler is attached.
The event handler.
When overridden in a derived (generated) class, attaches an event handler delegate to an internal event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the delegate.
The target where the handler is attached.
The name of the handler implementation.
When overridden in a derived (generated) class, creates an event delegate referencing a non-public handler method.
The delegate reference.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create.
Culture specific information.
When overridden in a derived (generated) class, creates an instance of an internal type.
The created instance.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.

trans-unit.source: Property information for the property to get.
The object that holds the desired property value.
Culture specific information.
When overridden in a derived (generated) class, gets the value of an internal property on the target object
The value of the property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.

trans-unit.source: Property information for the property to set.
The object that holds the desired property value.
The value to set.
Culture specific information.
When overridden in a derived (generated) class, sets the value on an internal property on the target object.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> classe não se destina para uso por qualquer coisa diferente de compilador de marcação XAML WPF.
